Introduction & Layouts Activities & Resources Intents & Fragments User Experience RecyclerViews Application Architecture Local Data Storage Networking Google Services Testing & Publishing Home Lectures Hello and welcome to the AND1 Exam Application called the Rasmussen.0 Please select a lecture from the Navigation drawer to get started. And here\'s a pokemon that you like. In the first lecture we learned about Layouts, Views, and basic components. For example: here is a button Here is a TextView inside of a FrameLayout Below is a LinearLayout with two ImageViews that have a set weight of 1 and 2. This is a constraint layout I do not like them that much, so i rarely use them. And those were the main things we learnt in the first lesson.
